wikipedia_page.main: Richard Aldred Lumley, 12th Earl of Scarbrough (5 December 1932 – 23 March 2004), styled Viscount Lumley between 1945 and 1969, was an English nobleman.

response: *Lady Elizabeth Anne Ramsay (16 September 1941), married Richard Lumley, 12th Earl of Scarbrough on 9 July 1970. They have four children and one granddaughter.
*Richard Lumley, 12th Earl of Scarbrough (1932–2004), English nobleman
* Richard Lumley, 12th Earl of Scarbrough, peer and soldier

The elder son of Richard Lumley, 12th Earl of Scarbrough, and his wife Lady Elizabeth, Lumley was educated at Eton College and was a Page of Honour to Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother from 1 March 1989 to 1 January 1991. He succeeded his father in 2004. In 2007, he married Henrietta Elfrida Helen Boyson. Scarbrough was appointed a deputy lieutenant of South Yorkshire on 11 April 2011.
